alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 28 at 9:29AM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tampa Bay Ruskin FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... Horse Creek Near Arcadia at SR 72 affecting DeSoto County. .Rainy season is in full swing and as a result, the rivers are beginning to rise and approach Action Stage. Horse Creek near Arcadia is forecast into Minor Flood. For the Horse Creek...including Arcadia at SR 72...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Horse Creek Near Arcadia at SR 72. * WHEN...From Monday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The access road to Hidden Acres is impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening and continue rising to 13.0 feet early Wednesday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.9 feet on 08/25/2003. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Horse Creek Arcadia at SR 7 12.0 9.7 Sun 8 am 11.2 12.6 13.0 13.1 13.0 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 900 PM EDT.
